snp5.16:1120: “I am old, weak, my color gone,”“my eyesight is not clear, my hearing is faint.Do not let me perish confused along the way.Declare the Dhamma that I might understandthe abandoning here of birth and old age.” (1)
snp5.16:1121: “Having seen those stricken by forms,“people who are heedless, afflicted by forms,therefore, Piṅgiya, being heedful,abandon form for an end to renewed existence.” (2)
snp5.16:1122: “In the four directions, the four intermediate directions,above, below: in these ten directions, [218]there is nothing that you have not seen, heard, and sensed,and nothing in the world uncognized by you.Declare the Dhamma that I might understandthe abandoning here of birth and old age.” (3)
snp5.16:1123: “Observing people fallen into craving,“tormented, crushed by old age,therefore, Piṅgiya, being heedful,abandon craving for an end to renewed existence.” (4)
